data.text: @gillianoberholzer I've made a change were it will simply delete the search request if the user logged out. It should then move to the new request. Please let me know on WhatsApp when another user experiences a delay and I will check if it actually worked. Problem is I cannot even mail them to say they have logged out because I cannot get their details from the database if they have. The ID I have of them is not longer valid. :)
